description:
After your cold words, Natsuki tells you what’s on her mind. You and your stubborn sister find out what you both are actually feeling for the first time. Soon, these carefree yet important days come to an end when summer vacation ends...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momohara Natsuki wa Sunao ni Narenai
Natsuki Momohara n`arrive pas à tout avouer
桃原奈月は素直になれない
